TopicTitle: Countdown to 1.0, How not to launch a rocket in 0.90.0!

Articles.Content:
Hi Everybody, I wanted to make a lets play series with KSP for fun, but with 1.0 coming I decided to wait until then before starting a series. In the meantime, however, I can blow some stuff up!

And I'm open as always to suggestions, I'm a vid making noob

"Gently fall"

What is this phrase? I've never heard it used before.

Hi Everybody, I wanted to make a lets play series with KSP for fun, but with 1.0 coming I decided to wait until then before starting a series. In the meantime, however, I can blow some stuff up!

And I'm open as always to suggestions, I'm a vid making noob

Hi,

Cool video, laught a lot! :-)

What water mod do you use ? it looks awesome!

Thanks

"Gently fall"

What is this phrase? I've never heard it used before.

"gently fall' probably means I suck at commentary lol

- - - Updated - - -

ManuxKerb: I'm glad you liked it!! it was very fun to do (though a bit stressful to film!) I don't think I use a water mod. Do you mean like visual mods? My vid card is a bit crap (550 I think, years old) so i don't have any of those, but I did try to record/render in fairly hi-def (for 720p anyway). I mainly have parts mods and things like DRE, FAR, engineer, TAC life support.

I have another much shorter KSP vid on my channel (I don't have a link at the moment) you should check it out if you liked this one! It's much shorter, the explosions are more concentrated!

Edited April 19, 2015 by Rufledt
